author: Tank Archives
text: The Object 239 prototype was due #OTD in 1943. This tank was a halfway point between the KV-1S and the IS-1, with the hull from the former and turret from the latter. Only 149 tanks including the prototype were built before production shifted to the IS. #tanks #history #WW2 #WWII
